scripts.start: pm2 flush && pm2 start index.js --name stellar && pm2 logs stellar
scripts.stop: pm2 stop stellar && pm2 delete stellar && pm2 kill
scripts.restart: yarn stop && pm2 flush && yarn start
scripts.release:git: github-release release --user uniibu --repo stellar-wallet --tag v2.0.2 --name "v2.0.2" --description "stellar wallet release"
scripts.release:upload: github-release upload --user uniibu  --repo stellar-wallet --tag v2.0.2 --name "bitsler_stellar.sh" --file bitsler_stellar.sh
